name: dua-library
description: Tools for building and managing the RIZQ App dua library with Firebase Firestore - research, populate, validate, and organize authentic Islamic duas
author: RIZQ App Team

skills.name: add-dua
skills.description: Add a single dua to Firebase Firestore with all required fields (Arabic text, transliteration, translation, source, etc.)

skills.name: create-journey
skills.description: Create a new themed journey (collection of duas) with time-slot assignments in Firestore

skills.name: populate-batch
skills.description: Populate multiple duas from the dua library documentation into Firebase Firestore

skills.name: validate-library
skills.description: Validate the dua library for completeness, authenticity, and data quality

skills.name: library-status
skills.description: Show current status of the dua library - counts, categories, journeys, and gaps

skills.name: dua-pipeline
skills.description: Complete dua processing pipeline - takes a dua through research, validation, population, and journey integration

commands.name: dua-add
commands.description: Interactive command to add a new dua with guided prompts

commands.name: journey-create
commands.description: Interactive command to create a new journey

commands.name: library-sync
commands.description: Sync duas from documentation to Firebase Firestore

commands.name: library-report
commands.description: Generate a report of the current library status

commands.name: run-pipeline
commands.description: Run the complete dua processing pipeline - research, validate, populate, curate, and integrate

commands.name: dua-pipeline-status
commands.description: Check the status of the current dua pipeline

commands.name: dua-pipeline-cancel
commands.description: Cancel the current dua pipeline and reset state

agents.name: dua-researcher
agents.description: Research and find authentic duas with proper hadith sources, Arabic text, and scholarly verification

agents.name: dua-populator
agents.description: Format and insert duas into Firebase Firestore with proper validation

agents.name: journey-builder
agents.description: Design and create themed journeys by selecting and organizing duas in Firestore

agents.name: content-validator
agents.description: Validate dua content for authenticity, completeness, and Firestore data quality

agents.name: library-curator
agents.description: Curate and organize the dua library - manage categories, suggest improvements, identify gaps
